page.title: 01SEVERNSIDE/HALLEN/GAZETEER
page.content: At first appearance Severnside/Hallen does not look a very attractive area. Along the estuary there are extensive chemical works which produce a lot of smoke which blows over the whole area, as the prevailing wind is on-shore. In spite of this, and the fact that the M5 motorway has cut the village through the middle, there are some attractive properties here. There appears to be a policy of passively allowing this village to die, as much of the land is owned by the Companies and then leased out and no permission is being given for any new private development.Local people suspect that this is not the healthiest place to live and there are certainly very few amenities.
